__linear_model__¶

functions for optimizing linear models

pynumdiff.optimize.linear_model.__linear_model__.chebydiff(x, dt, params=None, options={'kernel_name': 'friedrichs', 'sliding': True, 'step_size': 1}, dxdt_truth=None, tvgamma=0.01, padding='auto', optimization_method='Nelder-Mead', optimization_options={'maxiter': 10}, metric='rmse')¶

Optimize the parameters for pynumdiff.linear_model.chebydiff See pynumdiff.optimize.__optimize__ and pynumdiff.linear_model.chebydiff for detailed documentation.

pynumdiff.optimize.linear_model.__linear_model__.lineardiff(x, dt, params=None, options={'kernel_name': 'gaussian', 'sliding': True, 'step_size': 10}, dxdt_truth=None, tvgamma=0.01, padding='auto', optimization_method='Nelder-Mead', optimization_options={'maxiter': 10}, metric='rmse')¶

Optimize the parameters for pynumdiff.linear_model.lineardiff See pynumdiff.optimize.__optimize__ and pynumdiff.linear_model.lineardiff for detailed documentation.

pynumdiff.optimize.linear_model.__linear_model__.polydiff(x, dt, params=None, options={'kernel_name': 'friedrichs', 'sliding': True, 'step_size': 1}, dxdt_truth=None, tvgamma=0.01, padding='auto', optimization_method='Nelder-Mead', optimization_options={'maxiter': 10}, metric='rmse')¶

Optimize the parameters for pynumdiff.linear_model.polydiff See pynumdiff.optimize.__optimize__ and pynumdiff.linear_model.polydiff for detailed documentation.

pynumdiff.optimize.linear_model.__linear_model__.savgoldiff(x, dt, params=None, options={}, dxdt_truth=None, tvgamma=0.01, padding='auto', optimization_method='Nelder-Mead', optimization_options={'maxiter': 10}, metric='rmse')¶

Optimize the parameters for pynumdiff.linear_model.savgoldiff See pynumdiff.optimize.__optimize__ and pynumdiff.linear_model.savgoldiff for detailed documentation.

pynumdiff.optimize.linear_model.__linear_model__.spectraldiff(x, dt, params=None, options={'even_extension': True, 'pad_to_zero_dxdt': True}, dxdt_truth=None, tvgamma=0.01, padding='auto', optimization_method='Nelder-Mead', optimization_options={'maxiter': 10}, metric='rmse')¶

Optimize the parameters for pynumdiff.linear_model.spectraldiff See pynumdiff.optimize.__optimize__ and pynumdiff.linear_model.spectraldiff for detailed documentation.
